record.id: field.name="query" and file.name="upgrade" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: query
record.file.name: upgrade

brief.brief: A query that specifies selection criteria to apply to the table named in this record.
Only records satisfying this query will be unloaded to the target table.

detail.detail: Specify "true" to select all records in the table. Alternately, you can enter a query to select specific records from the table. (for example, name#"contract") If no records satisfy the query, or the query is false then, only the dbdict is unloaded.

If you specify "true", the upgrade process can log the progress of the upgrade. If there is a query in this field other than "true", the upgrade process may not be able to log progress for the named table.
